info.title: Envoy
info.description: An Envoy connector that allows you to be able to connect your Envoy account (our REST API endpoints) to any other connectors. An example would be to create bulk invites in Envoy with details from a Microsoft Excel Online spreadsheet.

get.description: GET request to retrieve block list filters.

post.description: POST request to add a blocklist filter

get.description: GET request to retrieve the employees list
GET request to retrieve information around the flows for your location.
GET request to retrieve Invite information based on filtering.

post.description: This is the POST request to create an invite

get.description: GET request to retrieve information about a single Entry.
GET request to retrieve information about a single Invite.

patch.description: PATCH request to update an Invite's information.

post.description: Trigger an action in MS Flow when an Envoy Invite is created.
